NFR_Sentença: The system shall be able to process a value of 1 notification per second or less, and up to and including 100 notifications in 15 seconds or less.

Descritivo_da_US: EU COMO Scrum Master DESEJO fazer login PARA ter acesso ao sistema
NFR_Sentença: In 100% of all cases, the system must have a mean response time of < 3s between event <user login> and event <first page view>. It is assumed that there are 50 concurrent users, during 120 seconds with 30-seconds of ramp-up.

Descritivo_da_US: EU COMO Scrum Master DESEJO fazer login PARA ter acesso ao sistema
NFR_Sentença: The system must automatically disable customer and user accounts for inactivity after a designated period of time. This should be configurable by user type.

NFR_Sentença: If the server goes offline during data removal, the system must display a loading for a maximum of 1 minute.
